data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Nakhon Si Thammarat. Through your servants plant 308 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Urak Lawoi people. 1.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Nakhon Si Thammarat to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand has a population of 1,544,400.

We estimate Nakhon Si Thammarat has 9,986 people who might know Jesus, 10,194 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,524,220 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,544,400 citizens of the the state of Nakhon Si Thammarat.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.
